location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of the Eastern Part of the Arabian Peninsula

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink and pencil on paper.Dimensions: 328 x 202mm.

mods.abstract: This sketch map depicts the eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula, from Ras-al Khaimah [Ra's al-Khaymah] in the north-east to Salalah in the south-east, with place names handwritten in ink. A red-dotted line marks an interpretation of the interior boundary of the Sultanate of Muscat and Oman. The map accompanies a preceding page of printed notes on the boundary of Muscat, prepared by the Political Agent and Consul of Muscat.
